metadata.synopsis: "Journey To The Sun" is a story of friendship, courage and a politically naive man's transformation into someone too painfully aware of the social realities of contemporary Turkey. Two young man from different regions of Turkey - Mehmet from the West, Berzan from the East - are bonded together in their struggle to survive as lower-class citizens in Istanbul.

reviews: A vivid parable about the plight of persecuted minorities in large cities around the world.
